May contain spoilers from Extinction Curse **Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 73 **Frequency** once per hour **Trigger** You take damage or cast a primal spell. --- The life-giving properties of the _aeon orbs_ flourish within you. Small plants or fungi magically appear on all surfaces in a 60-foot emanation around you. This life withers after 1 day unless the environment can support it. You can choose one of the following options each time you use this feat.
  • You can cause any number of 5-foot squares in the area to be light undergrowth, which is difficult terrain and provides lesser cover.
  • You can cause a tree or giant mushroom to appear in any unoccupied location in the area; it occupies an entire 5-foot square and provides standard cover. The tree or mushroom has 5 Hardness and 50 Hit Points.
Capstone Feats **Source** [Pathfinder #156: The Apocalypse Prophet](/Sources.aspx?ID=36) pg. 72 Characters who have reached 20th level can choose from the following feats, representing the pinnacle of mortal power influenced by their triumphs. **Related Feats**: [Annihilating Swing](/Feats.aspx?ID=1240), [Astonishing Explosion](/Feats.aspx?ID=1241), [Banishing Blow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1242), [Denier of Destruction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1243), [Endurance of the Rooted Tree](/Feats.aspx?ID=1244), [Mimic Protections](/Feats.aspx?ID=1245), [Reclaim Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=1246), [Reflecting Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=1247), [Ringmaster's Introduction](/Feats.aspx?ID=1248), [Steal Essence](/Feats.aspx?ID=1249), [Tenacious Blood Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1250)
